languages.text: "Кабалиты Бури уже успели обчистить рейдер. Значит, то, что я ищу, должно быть скрыто где-то в шпиле. Думаю... думаю, в пыточной. Как только войдем внутрь, нужно проследовать сквозь первые палаты прямо и затем два раза свернуть налево. Идем же — я намерен забрать свое".

"The Tempest's Kabalites have already picked the raider clean. That means that what I seek must be hidden somewhere in the spire. I think... I think it's in the torture chamber. Once inside, we must proceed through the first chambers directly ahead and turn left, then left again. Come — I intend to claim what is mine."
languages.original_text: "Кабалиты Бури уже успели обчистить рейдер. Значит, то, что я ищу, должно быть скрыто где-то в шпиле. Думаю... думаю, в пыточной. Как только войдем внутрь, нужно проследовать сквозь первые палаты прямо и затем два раза свернуть налево. Идем же — я намерен забрать свое".

Once inside, we must proceed through the first chambers directly ahead and turn left, then left again. Come — I intend to claim what is mine."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

Once inside, we must proceed through the first chambers directly ahead and turn left, then left again. Come — I intend to claim what is mine."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “狂风阴谋团的人已经把这架战机里的东西扫了个精光。也就是说，我要找的东西肯定藏在尖塔里的某个地方。我认为应该……应该是在刑讯室里。进了尖塔之后，我们要直接通过第一个房间，之后左转，再左转。来吧，我要夺回属于我的东西。”
languages.original_text: "The Tempest's Kabalites have already picked the raider clean. That means that what I seek must be hidden somewhere in the spire. I think... I think it's in the torture chamber. Once inside, we must proceed through the first chambers directly ahead and turn left, then left again. Come — I intend to claim what is mine."

traits.locale_text: “狂风阴谋团的人已经把这架战机里的东西扫了个精光。也就是说，我要找的东西肯定藏在尖塔里的某个地方。我认为应该……应该是在刑讯室里。进了尖塔之后，我们要直接通过第一个房间，之后左转，再左转。来吧，我要夺回属于我的东西。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「陰謀団『略奪の嵐』が、すでにレイダーを全部漁ってるってことか。ということは、俺の探し物は尖塔のどこかに隠れているはずだ。おそらく…拷問室にあるだろう。中に入ったら、真正面の最初の部屋を通り抜け、それから左、また左に曲がるんだ。さあ…俺様のものを奪いに行くぞ」
languages.original_text: "The Tempest's Kabalites have already picked the raider clean. That means that what I seek must be hidden somewhere in the spire. I think... I think it's in the torture chamber. Once inside, we must proceed through the first chambers directly ahead and turn left, then left again. Come — I intend to claim what is mine."

traits.locale_text: 「陰謀団『略奪の嵐』が、すでにレイダーを全部漁ってるってことか。ということは、俺の探し物は尖塔のどこかに隠れているはずだ。おそらく…拷問室にあるだろう。中に入ったら、真正面の最初の部屋を通り抜け、それから左、また左に曲がるんだ。さあ…俺様のものを奪いに行くぞ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Los Kabalistas de la Tempestad ya han saqueado el incursor. Eso significa que lo que busco estará en algún lugar de la torre. Creo... creo que estará en la cámara de torturas. Una vez dentro, debemos atravesar las primeras cámaras todo recto, después girar a la izquierda y luego otra vez a la izquierda. Vamos. Tengo intención de recuperar lo que es mío».
languages.original_text: "The Tempest's Kabalites have already picked the raider clean. That means that what I seek must be hidden somewhere in the spire. I think... I think it's in the torture chamber. Once inside, we must proceed through the first chambers directly ahead and turn left, then left again. Come — I intend to claim what is mine."

traits.locale_text: «Los Kabalistas de la Tempestad ya han saqueado el incursor. Eso significa que lo que busco estará en algún lugar de la torre. Creo... creo que estará en la cámara de torturas. Una vez dentro, debemos atravesar las primeras cámaras todo recto, después girar a la izquierda y luego otra vez a la izquierda. Vamos. Tengo intención de recuperar lo que es mío».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Les Kabalites de la Tempête ont déjà pillé le vaisseau. Autrement dit, ce que je cherche doit être caché quelque part dans la tour. Probablement dans la salle de torture. Une fois à l'intérieur, nous devrons traverser les premières pièces avant de prendre deux fois à gauche. Venez, j'entends récupérer ce qui m'appartient. »
languages.original_text: "The Tempest's Kabalites have already picked the raider clean. That means that what I seek must be hidden somewhere in the spire. I think... I think it's in the torture chamber. Once inside, we must proceed through the first chambers directly ahead and turn left, then left again. Come — I intend to claim what is mine."

traits.locale_text: « Les Kabalites de la Tempête ont déjà pillé le vaisseau. Autrement dit, ce que je cherche doit être caché quelque part dans la tour. Probablement dans la salle de torture. Une fois à l'intérieur, nous devrons traverser les premières pièces avant de prendre deux fois à gauche. Venez, j'entends récupérer ce qui m'appartient. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Der Sturm der Kabale ist bereits über den Raider hinweggefegt. Das heißt, dass das, was ich suche, irgendwo im Turm versteckt sein muss. Ich glaube ... Ich glaube, es ist in der Folterkammer. Dort angekommen, müssen wir durch die ersten Kammern direkt vor uns, ehe wir uns zweimal links halten müssen. Folgt mir – ich werde holen, was mir gehört."
languages.original_text: "The Tempest's Kabalites have already picked the raider clean. That means that what I seek must be hidden somewhere in the spire. I think... I think it's in the torture chamber. Once inside, we must proceed through the first chambers directly ahead and turn left, then left again. Come — I intend to claim what is mine."

traits.locale_text: "Der Sturm der Kabale ist bereits über den Raider hinweggefegt. Das heißt, dass das, was ich suche, irgendwo im Turm versteckt sein muss. Folgt mir – ich werde holen, was mir gehört."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Kasırga Kabalistleri, baskıncıda ne var ne yok toplamışlar. Bu da demek oluyor ki arayıp bulmam gereken şey, kulede bir yerlerde gizli. Sanırım... Sanırım işkence odasında. İçeri girdiğimizde ilk odadan doğruca ilerleyip sola, sonra tekrar sola dönmemiz gerek. Hadi gel... Bana ait olanı almaya kararlıyım."
languages.original_text: "The Tempest's Kabalites have already picked the raider clean. That means that what I seek must be hidden somewhere in the spire. I think... I think it's in the torture chamber. Once inside, we must proceed through the first chambers directly ahead and turn left, then left again. Come — I intend to claim what is mine."

traits.locale_text: "Kasırga Kabalistleri, baskıncıda ne var ne yok toplamışlar. Bu da demek oluyor ki arayıp bulmam gereken şey, kulede bir yerlerde gizli. Sanırım... Sanırım o, işkence odasında. İçeri girdiğimizde ilk odadan doğruca ilerleyip sola, sonra tekrar sola dönmemiz gerek. Hadi gel... Bana ait olanı almaya kararlıyım."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
